channel.title: Fast And Easy Way To Earn Money For Your VPS
channel.description:
[center]If this isn't the proper board for this post then I'm sorry, I'm new to this particular rsps forum.[/center]
[center][url=http://www.trypandaresearch.com/5l4eNH5H6hRCrJ6y+0dtOQ==][img]http://www.pandaresearch.com/images/pro_bnnrs/green/green-6.gif[/img][/url][center]
[left][size=12pt] Just thought I would share this amazing site with everyone. It's really really easy to make cash, and it's helped me a lot in paying for my VPS. And knowing how many people are avidly looking for opportunities to make extra money, I'm sure this will help lots!
Enjoy![/size][/left]

item.title: Fast And Easy Way To Earn Money For Your VPS
item.dc:creator: @ccc1 ccc1
item.description:
@ccc1 wrote:

[quote=“Whackatre, post:1, topic:515581”][quote author=ccc1 link=topic=633830.msg4280677#msg4280677 date=1365518719]

You’re right, he was just making fun of you. I’m sure that’s what his post meant, because it just screams ‘you can get a job instead of scamming people’ rather then telling anyone who is trying to make a few quick bucks to work for it. Right.

Jumping to a conclusion that has yet to be proven untrue, suspicious? You would have reacted in your superior tone had no one made a rude comment, which they didn’t before YOU jumped to the conclusion that someone was making fun of you.

Yes, because you’re ALWAYS right and everyone else is wrong. Nope, not showing how arrogant you are in that sentence. Looks like someone needs a reality check.

Woah woah woah lol something that has yet to be proven untrue? I was never given a chance lol… What do you expect me to be all happy and nice when I’m being accused of something that’s not true? It’s stupid and foolish to assume without proof.

You contradict yourself alot lol…

I never said he made fun of me, can anyone here read? I said he was being sarcastic and jumping to conclusions. And it’s obvious that he was by his tone.

hmm I would have still spoke in my ‘superior tone’? So you’re all knowing now? You’re so pathetic haha. It’s funny how serious you get you hot headed narcissist lol this is all just a game for me yet you get so defensive over the internet. Normally I wouldn’t go back and forth for so long but you’re just so damn amusing XD
[/quote]

hi are you a complete moron or do you just love to act like one[/quote]

Awwww how cute, It tried to insult me. pats on head

"Okay.

First off, there is a difference between ignorance, trolling and being an asshole.

Nobody here has done a single thing to upset you, mentally/physically harm you or anything else to that matter. I don’t see why you are acting like a child. Though since you are new you are giving yourself a good name so far. I’m sure some people appreciate you giving them a link to earn a little cash. Not everyone has heard of surveys and making money from it.
I suggest you stop posting ignorant shit and learn to respect others here because that is the only way they will respect you."

Am I suppose to laugh? lol

Read full topic

Alright.

I didn’t quote it did i? There was no suggestion i said that you said he was making fun of you. Reading is a hard task which vary few can actually do, so no, no one here can read. Very pathetic. I know, i amuse myself all the time. Very amusing.

Ohh, Whackatre, you shouldn’t have said that. Now he is going to be all like ‘lol, all of you simple minded people are so amusing and pathetic’, what have you done?!

item.title: Fast And Easy Way To Earn Money For Your VPS
item.dc:creator: @ccc1 ccc1
item.description:
@ccc1 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:28, topic:515574”]Oh yes, i would love for you to hold my drool bucket but i must worn you at times when i try to think it gets extra full.

I never demanded anyone click on the link lol… And i wasn’t “arrogant” until what’s his face made his smart ass remark…

Or you can get a job. I heard that can earn up to $2000 each week!

This what’s his face? That wasn’t a smart arse remark, and you saying that he was trolling was incorrect. He stated a more successful way of earning money rather then your poor excuse for one. You were arrogant, still are, and most likely always will be. I don’t think anyone will disagree with me on that point, other then yourself, because you’re too headstrong to admit it to yourself.[/quote]

He was referring to the “(5-$75 per survey)” on my post. He was being a sarcastic smart ass(or you can get a job instead of scamming people is basically what he said. It’s a shame I had to spell that out for you.) If you can’t see that then you clearly have some form of social deficit…

You all jumped to conclusions and made false judgments from the start, when I was honestly trying to share a money method. If no one acted that way, I would not have reacted the way I did.

You’re just mad because you know that I am right, and you are wrong.

item.title: Fast And Easy Way To Earn Money For Your VPS
item.dc:creator: @ccc1 ccc1
item.description:
@ccc1 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:20, topic:515574”][quote author=ccc1 link=topic=633830.msg4280637#msg4280637 date=1365512522]

I believe the saying is ‘treat others how you wish to be treated’, your wording suggests that you will be treated how you wish to be treated.

I was making fun of you, little one… lmfao wow
[/quote]
Right, you didn’t do it very well. You might want to work on that, and your method of taking advantage of younger children.[/quote]

You said this:

“Yes, let’s make a topic about helping people and then degrade them! Logic.”

I was being logical. If you scroll up you will clearly see I was nice at first. I said it in an improper way on purpose to reflect your stupidity, So I believe I’m doing a pretty good job. You’re just too stupid to know when someones making fun of you. Was that too complicated for your minute brain to grasp?

EDIT: Ruby, you’re retarded… The “spending money on games comment” that I made wasn’t even directed at you; I addressed you after I made that comment to someone else… Do you know how to read?

And using a referral link isn’t taking advantage, Do you lose any money? Anyways, that’s besides the point, I just said I didn’t care if the referral link was used.

Also, you didn’t get mad until you misinterpreted the comment I made about spending money on games as being directed towards you. Don’t you know when you get defensive, it shows your true colors? Now everybody knows you’re a nerd that spends paycheck money on video games lmao 50 points!

I believe the saying is ‘treat others how you wish to be treated’, your wording suggests that you will be treated how you wish to be treated.
[/quote]
Like I said, I’m here to help.

You people are so quick to judge.[/quote]
Here to help my ass, if you were here to help you’d be doing something useful and productive rather than trying to get people to use your referral link. If you were doing this for no personal gain then you wouldn’t have put the ref link in there in the first place. If you truly are here to help, go to some of the help boards and help the people who need it. We aren’t so quick to judge, we just don’t take kindly to people who try to take advantage.

item.title: Fast And Easy Way To Earn Money For Your VPS
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“ccc1, post:10, topic:515574”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=633830.msg4280622#msg4280622 date=1365510731]

Or you can get a job. I heard that can up to $2000 each week!

That amount of cash is a surgeons income if not lawyer, cant imagine any teenagers here receiving that amount in the bank per week.

OT: One glance at the website and I can already tell it is full of shit

I said up to $2000. I realize alot of people here will never earn that much in their lives.

Well, I said extra money, so there was no reason for your input anyways… Only a loser would spend their hard earned dollars on a game… I take it you do?

“This isn’t a place for you to make money, nice referral link you’ve got there.”

Both people benefit, smart one.

Besides, the referral link is there; might as well use it.

I literally spend close to no money on games and gaming, my money goes towards alcohol and keeping my cars running. Not really a big fan of your stereotypes. This will be locked or removed soon anyway.
[/quote]

My stereotypes? lol… You’re the one that came in here being an obnoxious fool and you have the nerve to say that? lol nice sense of humor btw XD[/quote]
Yes, your stereotypes. What makes you think I spend money on games? Because I’m an active member of a gaming community? That’s stereotypical my friend. I’m not being an obnoxious fool, I’m stating the idiocy of someone like you. What makes you think a community forum which has a strict no goods exchanged policy would allow referral links for someone to make money of their users?
